faqs.question: How do I use the bone parenting and twist bone features?
faqs.answer:
### Bone Parenting
[image]https://i.imgur.com/lH8lNVa.png[/image]

[info]Useful for Dynamic Bones where it's ideal to have one root bone with child bones[/info]

Features:
- To parent: Select bone groups for parenting
- Refresh list: Rebuilds bone group cache
- Parent bones: Creates RootBone_xyz structure

### Generate Twist Bones
[image]https://i.imgur.com/G7oZiMO.png[/image]

- Generates twist bones for selected bones
- Improves deformation and animation quality
